prompt: Make a website for a institute that primarily focuces on coding, development and DSA.
refinedPrompt: Create a website for CodeTech Institute, an educational organization focused on teaching coding, software development, and data structures and algorithms (DSA). The website should have a modern, responsive design and include the following pages: Home, About Us, Courses (featuring detailed information on coding, development, and DSA courses), Faculty, Student Resources, and Contact Us. Implement a user-friendly navigation menu, engaging visuals, and clear calls-to-action to encourage prospective students to enroll in courses. Integrate a blog section to share industry news, student success stories, and helpful learning resources.
